content: I do not have access to up-to-date information on art exhibitions or displays. however, there are a few museums and galleries that are known for their collections of john constable's works. the national gallery and the tate britain in london, the victoria and albert museum in london, and the museum of fine arts in boston are all institutions that have extensive collections of constable's paintings. if you plan on visiting any of these institutions, i highly recommend checking their websites to see if they have any current exhibitions or special displays featuring constable's works. you can also check with your local museums or galleries to see if they have any upcoming exhibits or displays of his works.
